channel.title: NPR Topics: News
channel.description: NPR news, audio, and podcasts. Coverage of breaking stories, national and world news, politics, business, science, technology, and extended coverage of major national and world events.
channel.copyright: Copyright 2024 NPR - For Personal Use Only

item.title: What the DNC revealed about Harris' plan for immigration
item.description: Republicans have accused Presidential candidate Kamala Harris of being weak on immigration. At this week’s Democratic National Convention, the party sent a clear message about Harris’ stance.
item.content:encoded: Republicans have accused Presidential candidate Kamala Harris of being weak on immigration. At this week’s Democratic National Convention, the party sent a clear message about Harris’ stance.
item.dc:creator: Jasmine Garsd

item.title: NASA will bring stranded astronauts back on SpaceX — not Boeing's Starliner
item.description: NASA had been weighing whether it would be safe enough to return two astronauts to Earth on Boeing's Starliner.
item.content:encoded: NASA had been weighing whether it would be safe enough to return two astronauts to Earth on Boeing's Starliner.
item.dc:creator: Nell Greenfieldboyce

item.title: A re-organized Wagner Group is being led by Putin and targeting Africa
item.dc:creator: Adrian Ma

item.title: 'Track Change' podcast follows 4 incarcerated men as they record an album
item.description: Garland Carr, featured on the podcast Track Change, was recently released from prison. NPR's Adrian Ma talks to him about how he's adjusting to life on the outside.
item.content:encoded: Garland Carr, featured on the podcast Track Change, was recently released from prison. NPR's Adrian Ma talks to him about how he's adjusting to life on the outside.
item.dc:creator: Mallory Yu

item.title: NPR investigates harassment accusations against former top aide of Eric Garcetti
item.description: NPR uncovered new allegations of sexual harassment against a former top adviser to the U.S. ambassador to India, Eric Garcetti, and new questions about whether Garcetti lied under oath.
item.content:encoded: NPR uncovered new allegations of sexual harassment against a former top adviser to the U.S. ambassador to India, Eric Garcetti, and new questions about whether Garcetti lied under oath.
item.dc:creator: Tom Dreisbach

item.title: After years of running the Beer Mile, the record holder considers stepping away
item.description: NPR's Adrian Ma speaks with Canadian runner Corey Bellemore about holding the world record for running the beer mile and why this year's race may be his last.
item.content:encoded: NPR's Adrian Ma speaks with Canadian runner Corey Bellemore about holding the world record for running the beer mile and why this year's race may be his last.
item.dc:creator: Vincent Acovino

item.title: A new round of free COVID tests is coming soon
item.description: Starting in late September, Americans will be able to order up to four free at-home COVID-19 tests that will be delivered to your mailbox. The tests will be able to detect newer variants of the virus.
item.content:encoded:
Starting in late September, Americans will be able to order up to four free at-home COVID-19 tests that will be delivered to your mailbox. The tests will be able to detect newer variants of the virus.

(Image credit: Patrick Sison)
item.dc:creator: Emma Bowman

item.title: Fauci is recovering at home after being hospitalized for West Nile virus
item.description: Dr. Anthony Fauci, the former top U.S. infectious disease expert, spent time in the hospital after being infected with West Nile virus and is now recovering at home, a spokesperson said.
item.content:encoded:
Dr. Anthony Fauci, the former top U.S. infectious disease expert, spent time in the hospital after being infected with West Nile virus and is now recovering at home, a spokesperson said.

(Image credit: Jose Luis Magana)
item.dc:creator: The Associated Press

item.title: NLRB says Amazon is a joint employer of some 3rd-party delivery drivers in California
item.description: The two sides have been in disagreement about whether Amazon bears legal responsibility to its delivery drivers, who are technically employed by third-party companies but deliver Amazon packages.
item.content:encoded:
The two sides have been in disagreement about whether Amazon bears legal responsibility to its delivery drivers, who are technically employed by third-party companies but deliver Amazon packages.

(Image credit: Robyn Beck)
item.dc:creator: Juliana Kim

item.title: Italian prosecutors open a manslaughter investigation into yacht sinking off Sicily
item.description: Prosecutors opened an investigation into culpable shipwreck and multiple manslaughter after a yacht capsized off the coast of Sicily, killing seven people onboard. No suspect is currently identified.
item.content:encoded:
Prosecutors opened an investigation into culpable shipwreck and multiple manslaughter after a yacht capsized off the coast of Sicily, killing seven people onboard. No suspect is currently identified.

(Image credit: Alberto Lo Bianco)
item.dc:creator: The Associated Press
